oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Various radio excerpts
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Various radio excerpts including: an announcer introducing Edward Matthews, who begins to perform 'My Love'; an announcer introducing 'Johnny', who performs 'Little Old Rag Doll'; various 'Johnny Presents' Philip Morris program excerpts featuring Audrey Marsh, Beverly, Jack Smith, Max Marcin, the Swing Fourteen, John Field, Charles O'Connor, Ray Bloch, and Johnny Roventini; and an unidentified radio drama excerpt, possibly also part of the 'Johnny Presents' Philip Morris program.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Edward Matthews; Audrey Marsh
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: [Unidentified orchestral excerpt] -- [Unidentified radio excerpt] -- [Unidentified big band excerpt] -- My Love (Edward Matthews) (excerpt) -- Little Old Rag Doll (Johnny) -- Gillette commercial -- 'Johnny Presents' excerpt -- 'Johnny Presents' excerpt -- [Unidentified musical excerpt] -- These Things You Left Me (Audrey Marsh) (excerpt) -- 'Johnny Presents' excerpt -- [Unidentified radio drama excerpt] -- 'Johnny Presents' excerpt -- 'Johnny Presents' excerpt -- With A Twist Of The Wrist (unidentified, excerpt) -- [Unidentified big band excerpt]
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Matthews, Edward, 1904-1954; Marcin, Max, 1879-1948; Swing Fourteen; Marsh, Audrey; Bloch, Ray; Roventini, Johnny; CBS Inc.
